entry.title: MK6854 Cherry Finished Solid Back Wooden Restaurant Chair with Black Vinyl Seat
entry.summary:
Vendor: MKLD Furniture
Type: Wooden Chairs
Price: 135.00

FEATURES

The wood chair will offer a classic,elegant look when furnishing your establishment. This stool is easy to clean,which is an important aspect when it comes to a business. This stool was designed to withstand the daily rigors in the hospitality industry,but will also provide a warm and inviting quality to your home. The thick,foam padded seat will keep users comfortable. The floor glides help protect your floors and ensure smooth gliding. This elegantly styled stool will highlight your home or business without disappointment. 

 

Width:18"

Overall Height:34"

Seat Height:18"

Seat Depth:17"

entry.title: MK6236D Slotted Wooden Back Side Chair with Walnut Finish
entry.summary:
Vendor: MKLD Furniture
Type: Wooden Chairs
Price: 135.00

FEATURES

Create a first-rate dining experience by offering your patrons tasty food, great service and attractive furnishings. These wood chair will offer a classic, elegant look to your establishment.

The thick, foam padded seat will provide comfortable seating while the durable frame is stabilized with reinforced brackets and solid construction.Each chair is equipped with four plastic foot glides to help protect your floors and ensure smooth gliding across all surfaces. This elegantly styled chair will be a great additional to your business.

entry.title: MK6239 Mahogany Finished Vertical Slat Back Wooden Restaurant Chair
entry.summary:
Vendor: MKLD Furniture
Type: Wooden Chairs
Price: 159.00

Elegant Wood Chair Description: This Chair Is A Very Elegant Wood Chair With Details. It's The Top Option For Style And It Is Designed For Heavy Duty Commercial Usage. It Is Made Out Of Solid European Beech Wood. It Is Assembled With Solid Wood Corner Blocks, Secured By Two Wood Bolts And Four Wood Screws, Distribute Pressure Throughout Frame. All Joints Are Glued, Screwed, And Connected By Mortise And Tenon. Legs Are Secured To The Seat Pan Using Durable Wood Bolts. Critical Pressure Points Are Reinforced With Heavy Duty L Brackets. The Same Designed Barstools Are Available.

Finish: Walnut, Mahogany, Cherry, Natural, Black, Wild Cherry, Red Cherry

Seat: Wood Veneer, 1” Thick Solid Wood Or 2” Thick High Density Foam Upholstered With Standard Fabric, Vinyl Or COM

COM Yardage: 0.5 Yds For The Seat,

Glides: Plastic

Counter-Height Stools Available

Arms Available For Addon

Specifications

Width: 18”

Overall Height: 34”

Seat Height: 18"

Seat Depth: 17"

Shipping Weight: 20 Lbs Each

entry.summary:
Vendor: MKLD Furniture
Type: Wooden Chairs
Price: 159.00

The Unique Back Design Is An Ideal For Hospitality Setting. This Side Chair Is Designed For Heavy Duty Commercial Usage. It Is Made Out Of Solid European Beech Wood. It Is Assembled With Solid Wood Corner Blocks, Secured By Two Wood Bolts And Four Wood Screws, Distribute Pressure Throughout Frame. All Joints Are Glued, Screwed, And Connected By Mortise And Tenon. Legs Are Secured To The Seat Pan Using Durable Wood Bolts. Critical Pressure Points Are Reinforced With Heavy Duty L Brackets.
